name: kylefinley.net
description: Source for KyleFinley.net. Vue2 front-end serving markdown posts.

scripts.clean:js-files: find packages/**/src/ -maxdepth 3 -type f -name '*.js' -delete && find infrastructure/bin/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -name '*.js' -delete && find infrastructure/bin/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -name '*.d.ts' -delete && find infrastructure/lib/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -name '*.js' -delete && find infrastructure/lib/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -name '*.d.ts' -delete && find infrastructure/test/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -name '*.js' -delete && find infrastructure/test/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -name '*.d.ts' -delete
scripts.super-clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm run clean && lerna exec -- rm package-lock.json || true && rm -rf .webpack && rm -rf services/WebSockets/dist && rm -rf infrastructure/cdk.out && npm run clean:js-files
scripts.build: lerna bootstrap --scope=@kylefinley.net/vue2-client --scope=@kylefinley.net/infrastructure && npm run build:client && npm run build:lambdas
scripts.build:client: lerna run build --scope=@kylefinley.net/vue2-client && npm run post-build:fix-img-paths
scripts.build:lambdas: lerna run build --stream --scope=@kylefinley.net/aws-websockets && cp -LRv services/WebSockets/node_modules services/WebSockets/dist > /dev/null 2>&1
scripts.sls:debug: export SLS_DEBUG=* && node --inspect node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless offline -s dev
scripts.sls:debug1: export SLS_DEBUG=* && node --inspect-brk=5858 node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless offline start --skipCacheInvalidation
scripts.clean-smoke: npm run super-clean && npm run bootstrap && npm run smoke
scripts.smoke: npm run build && npm run cdk synth
